name: Once upon a peddler
description:
Oh, no! The beloved pets of neighboring villages got lost in the country. You will lead them back to their home, but take care! Some pets are quite hungry and might wanna eat some others. Find the right route to bring all of them back home!

Controls

Arrow keys to move around

M to show/hide the minimap

Num0 to restart the level

Esc to pause/resume

Credits

Malik Boughida, Rafik Boughida, Adrien Kaiser, Thibaud Lambert, Gilles Laurent, Hélène Legrand, Claire Lescoat, Thibault Lescoat, Corentin Mercier, Élie Michel, Sylvain Rousseau, Théo Thonat

This game is a participation to the Quarantine Jam: https://itch.io/jam/ndab-jam
